node.name: SPCPortal
node.description: The portal is being designed for the department, faculties and students, to keep them updated about the internship/placement statistics as well as the upcoming opportunities. The portal will help students to efficiently manage their time and will provide them with an all-in-one hub for internship/placement activities. This portal will help the students and placement department to efficiently manage applications for companies and keep track of offers made to the students

node.name: VKP_App
node.description: There are many arcade machines which operate on inserting the money in order to play arcade games. But with increase in usage of digital payment It is required to digitalize the machines to keep up with the current technology. Solution was required to automatically credit the coins in game on successful payment from UPI or other payment method.

node.name: InstaPostDownloader
node.description: A python script to download all posts on instagram

node.description: Web Platform built on Django to host CTF contest.
